title: Fishing on the Diamantina
creator_credit: Wayne Gwynne, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Wayne Gwynne joined the Navy in 1960 when he was 17. Spending 5 years at sea, during peacetime, Gwynne got to see things that no one has seen before. While he still can’t talk about those things, he loved his time at sea, especially on his favourite ship, the ‘Diamantina’.
creator_credit_for_label: Wayne Gwynne, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
